name: nut-swagger
description: It generates Controller JavaScript files from you swagger files

scripts.test-generate-swagger-empty-controller-g: node index.js generate-default-controller ./swagger-definitions/greeting-definition.yaml ./services/controllers --overwrite true --isEmptyFunctionBody true --isShortFunctionBodySyntax false
scripts.test-generate-swagger-default-controller: node index.js generate-default-controller ./swagger-definitions/greeting-definition.yaml ./services/controllers --overwrite true --isEmptyFunctionBody false --isShortFunctionBodySyntax false
scripts.test-generate-swagger-empty-controllers-: node index.js generate-default-controllers-from-dir ./swagger-definitions ./services/controllers --overwrite true --isEmptyFunctionBody true --isShortFunctionBodySyntax false
scripts.test-generate-swagger-default-controller: node index.js generate-default-controllers-from-dir ./swagger-definitions ./services/controllers --overwrite true --isEmptyFunctionBody false --isShortFunctionBodySyntax true
scripts.test-generate-swagger-empty-repositories: node index.js generate-default-controllers-from-dir ./swagger-downstream-definitions ./services/repositories --overwrite true --isEmptyFunctionBody true --isShortFunctionBodySyntax true
scripts.test-generate-swagger-default-repositori: node index.js generate-default-controllers-from-dir ./swagger-downstream-definitions ./services/repositories --overwrite true --isEmptyFunctionBody false --isShortFunctionBodySyntax true
